category.name: Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_CRF_TIE_Integration
preference.preference_description: Sets the usage of TIE as an export format for CRF Reports. Valid Values: TRUE: chooses TCXML as the export format. FALSE: chooses PLMXML as the export format. This is the default value. This is a site preference.
